case.title: I'm Just a Normal guy - Seeking.... - 50 (Larchmont )
case.text: A compatible woman who adores all of her needs attended to... Yes - I have needs too and I think while we're together... We can work it out to the point of mutual gratification... Wouldn't be nice to wake up in the morning after spending a wonderful evening together, with all the twists - going out into the day only to come home to one another and spending a better night then the last together... I hope you are a grown up woman who knows what she wants out of life and can expect the same out of an adult male,,, Please contact me real soon ;)
